mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_hbit_stat_stnd.select */ SELECT sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,hbit_cnt_fr /* hbit_cnt_fr 심박_수_FROM numeric */ ,hbit_cnt_to /* hbit_cnt_to 심박_수_TO numeric */ ,hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_hbit_stat_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND hbit_cnt_fr = #{hbitCntFr} /* hbit_cnt_fr 심박_수_FROM numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_hbit_stat_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_hbit_stat_stnd ( sex_cd /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,age_ycnt /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,hbit_cnt_fr /* hbit_cnt_fr 심박_수_FROM numeric */ ,hbit_cnt_to /* hbit_cnt_to 심박_수_TO numeric */
,hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ ,#{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ ,#{hbitCntFr} /* hbit_cnt_fr 심박_수_FROM numeric */ ,#{hbitCntTo} /* hbit_cnt_to 심박_수_TO numeric */
,#{hbitStatCd} /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_hbit_stat_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_hbit_stat_stnd
,hbit_cnt_to = #{hbitCntTo} /* hbit_cnt_to 심박_수_TO numeric */
,hbit_stat_cd = #{hbitStatCd} /* hbit_stat_cd 심박_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND sex_cd = #{sexCd} /* sex_cd 성별_코드 character varying(20) */ AND age_ycnt = #{ageYcnt} /* age_ycnt 나이_년수 numeric */ AND hbit_cnt_fr = #{hbitCntFr} /* hbit_cnt_fr 심박_수_FROM numeric */
